column1: Being Sr.citizen,I am much worried about my visit to above places,on 26th,Sept,as regards to road accessibility,epidemic,and food.kindly threw some light.with a salute to the army and people ofxkerala for braving the situation.JATINKUMAR desai

Hi,Welcome to the forum and now the things is normal so no need to worry and make your travel plan. For more information you can go with this articular : https://www.tripadvisor.in/ShowTopic-g297631â€¦Regards,JitenderGo My Journey
Roads will be bad but open every where. There will be no problem with food and there is no epidemic situation. Take some precautions that is all. You will be safe to travel

Hi,no need to worry all roads and sightseeing point's are opened. Road conditions are ok.dont worry about food and all its plenty available only you need to avoid street foods and go for hygienic restaurants .on September 22nd it will be much better. Happy Journey
